Option Name: Left Distance: The distance between the unit and the neighboring building to the left (not including eaves). If not provided, assumes no neighboring building.
Right Distance: The distance between the unit and the neighboring building to the right (not including eaves). If not provided, assumes no neighboring building.
Back Distance: The distance between the unit and the neighboring building to the back (not including eaves). If not provided, assumes no neighboring building.
Front Distance: The distance between the unit and the neighboring building to the front (not including eaves). If not provided, assumes no neighboring building.
Left Height: The height of the neighboring building to the left. If not provided, uses the same height as the unit.
Right Height: The height of the neighboring building to the right. If not provided, uses the same height as the unit.
Back Height: The height of the neighboring building to the back. If not provided, uses the same height as the unit.
Front Height: The height of the neighboring building to the front. If not provided, uses the same height as the unit.
